div.pre: 2023 Caulonia, Bruttium, 1915 (221) Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. (Robinson) Contents: c. 20 AR Brettii: 3 dr. (1 Hera/Zeus; 2 Nike/river- god) 4 dr. (unc.) Punic: 3 quarter-shekels (as NC 1964, pl. 5, 13) Disposition: Syracuse 10 as above (ac- cording to Cesano), but not found there by Currò. Noe gives Reggio † Cesano, TINC 1936, p. 57 Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, pp. 232-3, 237 Robinson, NC 1964, p. 44 Currò (p. 237, note 45) suggests that this hd. and no. 1909 above are the same, but the discrepancy of contents and ter- minal dates makes this highly unlikely
